60class FatalOutOfMemoryHandler;
61class GarbageCollector;

65
66enum class HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject : uint8_t;
67
68class MoveListener {
69 public:
70 // This function may be called simultaneously on multiple threads.
71 // Implementations must not attempt to allocate or do any other actions
72 // which could trigger reentrant GC.
73 virtual void OnMove(Address from, Address to,
74 size_t size_including_header) = 0;
75};
76
77// Base class for heap implementations.
78class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE HeapBase : public cppgc::HeapHandle {
79 public:
80 using StackSupport = cppgc::Heap::StackSupport;
81 using MarkingType = cppgc::Heap::MarkingType;
82 using SweepingType = cppgc::Heap::SweepingType;
83
84 static HeapBase& From(cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
85 return static_cast<HeapBase&>(heap_handle);
86 }
87 static const HeapBase& From(const cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
88 return static_cast<const HeapBase&>(heap_handle);
89 }
90
91 HeapBase(std::shared_ptr<cppgc::Platform> platform,
92 const std::vector<std::unique_ptr<CustomSpaceBase>>& custom_spaces,
93 StackSupport stack_support, MarkingType marking_support,
94 SweepingType sweeping_support, GarbageCollector& garbage_collector);
95 virtual ~HeapBase();
96
97 HeapBase(const HeapBase&) = delete;
98 HeapBase& operator=(const HeapBase&) = delete;
99
100 RawHeap& raw_heap() { return raw_heap_; }
101 const RawHeap& raw_heap() const { return raw_heap_; }
102
103 cppgc::Platform* platform() { return platform_.get(); }
104 const cppgc::Platform* platform() const { return platform_.get(); }
105
106 FatalOutOfMemoryHandler& oom_handler() { return *oom_handler_.get(); }
107 const FatalOutOfMemoryHandler& oom_handler() const {
108 return *oom_handler_.get();
109 }
110
111 PageBackend* page_backend() { return page_backend_.get(); }
112 const PageBackend* page_backend() const { return page_backend_.get(); }
113
114 StatsCollector* stats_collector() { return stats_collector_.get(); }
115 const StatsCollector* stats_collector() const {
116 return stats_collector_.get();
117 }
118
119 PreFinalizerHandler* prefinalizer_handler() {
120 return prefinalizer_handler_.get();
121 }
122 const PreFinalizerHandler* prefinalizer_handler() const {
123 return prefinalizer_handler_.get();
124 }
125
126 MarkerBase* marker() const { return marker_.get(); }
127 std::unique_ptr<MarkerBase>& GetMarkerRefForTesting() { return marker_; }
128
129 Compactor& compactor() { return compactor_; }
130
131 ObjectAllocator& object_allocator() { return object_allocator_; }
132 const ObjectAllocator& object_allocator() const { return object_allocator_; }
133
134 Sweeper& sweeper() { return sweeper_; }
135 const Sweeper& sweeper() const { return sweeper_; }
136
137 PersistentRegion& GetStrongPersistentRegion() {
138 return strong_persistent_region_;
139 }
140 const PersistentRegion& GetStrongPersistentRegion() const {
141 return strong_persistent_region_;
142 }
143 PersistentRegion& GetWeakPersistentRegion() {
144 return weak_persistent_region_;
145 }
146 const PersistentRegion& GetWeakPersistentRegion() const {
147 return weak_persistent_region_;
148 }
149 CrossThreadPersistentRegion& GetStrongCrossThreadPersistentRegion() {
150 return strong_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
151 }
152 const CrossThreadPersistentRegion& GetStrongCrossThreadPersistentRegion()
153 const {
154 return strong_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
155 }
156 CrossThreadPersistentRegion& GetWeakCrossThreadPersistentRegion() {
157 return weak_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
158 }
159 const CrossThreadPersistentRegion& GetWeakCrossThreadPersistentRegion()
160 const {
161 return weak_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
162 }
163
164#if defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
165 OldToNewRememberedSet& remembered_set() { return remembered_set_; }
166#endif // defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
167
168 size_t ObjectPayloadSize() const;
169
170 virtual heap::base::Stack* stack() { return stack_.get(); }
171
172 StackSupport stack_support() const { return stack_support_; }
173
174 // These virtual methods are also present in class GarbageCollector.
175 virtual void set_override_stack_state(EmbedderStackState state) = 0;
176 virtual void clear_overridden_stack_state() = 0;
177
178 // Termination drops all roots (clears them out) and runs garbage collections
179 // in a bounded fixed point loop until no new objects are created in
180 // destructors. Exceeding the loop bound results in a crash.
181 void Terminate();
182
183 virtual bool IsGCForbidden() const;
184 bool in_atomic_pause() const { return in_atomic_pause_; }
185
186 HeapStatistics CollectStatistics(HeapStatistics::DetailLevel);
187
188 EmbedderStackState stack_state_of_prev_gc() const {
189 return stack_state_of_prev_gc_;
190 }
191 void SetStackStateOfPrevGC(EmbedderStackState stack_state) {
192 stack_state_of_prev_gc_ = stack_state;
193 }
194
195 void SetInAtomicPauseForTesting(bool value) { in_atomic_pause_ = value; }
196
197 virtual void StartIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting() = 0;
198 virtual void FinalizeIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting(
199 EmbedderStackState) = 0;
200
201 void SetMetricRecorder(std::unique_ptr<MetricRecorder> histogram_recorder) {
202 stats_collector_->SetMetricRecorder(std::move(histogram_recorder));
203 }
204
205 int GetCreationThreadId() const { return creation_thread_id_; }
206
207 MarkingType marking_support() const { return marking_support_; }
208 SweepingType sweeping_support() const { return sweeping_support_; }
209
210 bool incremental_marking_supported() const {
211 return marking_support_ != MarkingType::kAtomic;
212 }
213
214 bool generational_gc_supported() const {
215 const bool supported = is_young_generation_enabled();
216#if defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
217 DCHECK_IMPLIES(supported, YoungGenerationEnabler::IsEnabled());
218#endif // defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
219 return supported;
220 }
221
222 // Returns whether objects should derive their name from C++ class names. Also
223 // requires build-time support through `CPPGC_SUPPORTS_OBJECT_NAMES`.
224 HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject name_of_unnamed_object() const {
225 return name_for_unnamed_object_;
226 }
227 void set_name_of_unnamed_object(HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject value) {
228 name_for_unnamed_object_ = value;
229 }
230
231 // Callback support so that other components can listen to when objects are
232 // moved.
233 bool HasMoveListeners() const { return !move_listeners_.empty(); }
234 void CallMoveListeners(Address from, Address to,
235 size_t size_including_header);
236 void RegisterMoveListener(MoveListener* listener);
237 void UnregisterMoveListener(MoveListener* listener);
238
239 void set_incremental_marking_in_progress(bool value) {
240 is_incremental_marking_in_progress_ = value;
241 }
242
243 void EnterNoGCScope() { ++no_gc_scope_; }
244 void LeaveNoGCScope() {
245 DCHECK_GT(no_gc_scope_, 0);
246 --no_gc_scope_;
247 }
248
249 void EnterDisallowGCScope() { ++disallow_gc_scope_; }
250 void LeaveDisallowGCScope() {
251 DCHECK_GT(disallow_gc_scope_, 0);
252 --disallow_gc_scope_;
253 }
254
255 using HeapHandle::is_incremental_marking_in_progress;
256
257 protected:
258 static std::unique_ptr<PageBackend> InitializePageBackend(
259 PageAllocator& allocator);
260
261 // Used by the incremental scheduler to finalize a GC if supported.
262 virtual void FinalizeIncrementalGarbageCollectionIfNeeded(
263 cppgc::Heap::StackState) = 0;
264
265 virtual bool IsGCAllowed() const;
266
267 bool in_no_gc_scope() const { return no_gc_scope_ > 0; }
268
269 bool IsMarking() const { return marker_.get(); }
270
271 // Returns amount of bytes allocated while executing prefinalizers.
272 size_t ExecutePreFinalizers();
273
274#if defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
275 void EnableGenerationalGC();
276 void ResetRememberedSet();
277#endif // defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
278
279 PageAllocator* page_allocator() const;
280
281 RawHeap raw_heap_;
282 std::shared_ptr<cppgc::Platform> platform_;
283 std::unique_ptr<FatalOutOfMemoryHandler> oom_handler_;
284
285#if defined(LEAK_SANITIZER)
286 std::unique_ptr<v8::base::LsanPageAllocator> lsan_page_allocator_;
287#endif // LEAK_SANITIZER
288
289 std::unique_ptr<PageBackend> page_backend_;
290
291 // HeapRegistry requires access to page_backend_.
292 HeapRegistry::Subscription heap_registry_subscription_{*this};
293
294 std::unique_ptr<StatsCollector> stats_collector_;
295 std::unique_ptr<heap::base::Stack> stack_;
296 std::unique_ptr<PreFinalizerHandler> prefinalizer_handler_;
297 std::unique_ptr<MarkerBase> marker_;
298
299 Compactor compactor_;
300 ObjectAllocator object_allocator_;
301 Sweeper sweeper_;
302
303 PersistentRegion strong_persistent_region_;
304 PersistentRegion weak_persistent_region_;
305 CrossThreadPersistentRegion strong_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
306 CrossThreadPersistentRegion weak_cross_thread_persistent_region_;
307
308 ProcessHeapStatisticsUpdater::AllocationObserverImpl
309 allocation_observer_for_PROCESS_HEAP_STATISTICS_;
310#if defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
311 OldToNewRememberedSet remembered_set_;
312#endif // defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
313
314 size_t no_gc_scope_ = 0;
315 size_t disallow_gc_scope_ = 0;
316
317 const StackSupport stack_support_;
318 EmbedderStackState stack_state_of_prev_gc_ =
319 EmbedderStackState::kNoHeapPointers;
320
321 bool in_atomic_pause_ = false;
322
323 int creation_thread_id_ = v8::base::OS::GetCurrentThreadId();
324
325 MarkingType marking_support_;
326 SweepingType sweeping_support_;
327
328 HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject name_for_unnamed_object_ =
329 HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject::kUseHiddenName;
330
331 std::vector<MoveListener*> move_listeners_;
332
333 friend class MarkerBase::IncrementalMarkingTask;
334 friend class cppgc::subtle::DisallowGarbageCollectionScope;
335 friend class cppgc::testing::Heap;
336};
337
338class V8_NODISCARD V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE ClassNameAsHeapObjectNameScope final {
339 public:
340 explicit ClassNameAsHeapObjectNameScope(HeapBase& heap);
341 ~ClassNameAsHeapObjectNameScope();
342
343 private:
344 HeapBase& heap_;
345 const HeapObjectNameForUnnamedObject saved_heap_object_name_value_;
346};
347
348} // namespace internal
349} // namespace cppgc
